## Project Manager

[![runs with Expo Go](https://img.shields.io/badge/Runs%20with%20Expo%20Go-000.svg?style=flat-square&logo=EXPO&labelColor=f3f3f3&logoColor=000)](https://expo.dev/client)

## Potential Release

![logo](https://img.shields.io/badge/Release-November_2023-red?style=flat-square)

## Description:

<p>The "Mobile Clinic" app utilizes React Native and Kotlin to provide a user-friendly healthcare solution in Bangladesh, addressing accessibility and quality issues. It offers a seamless experience on Android and iOS, while prioritizing data security.<p>

## Type of the app:

![logo](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mobile-Application-black?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

## Main features:

1. User Registration and Profiles

   - Unique user profiles
   - Medical history, allergies, emergency contacts

2. Doctor Search and Appointment Booking

   - Robust search (specialization, location, ratings)
   - Real-time appointment booking

3. Video Consultations and Secure Messaging

   - Remote video consultations
   - Secure follow-up messaging

4. Prescription, Treatment, and Pharmacy

   - Direct prescription of medications
   - Integrated pharmacy for orders and delivery

5. Emergency Assistance

   - Instant connection to nearby medical services

6. Health Records and Appointments

   - Store medical records, tests, prescriptions
   - Central repository for decisions

7. Wellness Resources

   - Access health articles, videos, tips

8. Doctor Quality Moderation
   - Evaluate treatment, patient satisfaction
   - Maintain high standards

## Written in:

    1. Frontend: React Native
    2. Backend: Firebase (BaaS)
    3. Frameworks: React Native (Fontend), Firebase (Backend)
    4. Database: Firebase
    5. Managed by: Expo

    2. Database: Firebase (BaaS)
